chat.msg: hola, q tal? ready to go?

Hola, si. Primero tienes que pasar por el tigre and then loop around the parrot all the way to the frog. You have to walk under the frog, about the length of the frogs body, and then loop back around and walk across the alligator all the way through it's mouth. Then you'll go across the water, via the rocks to the left of the elephant. Once you get to the Giraffe, you loop down and across the snake y aqi vas a ver el treasure box.
gotcha, so i'm passing the tiger now, heading towards the parrot. okay, walked under the frog's belly and looping back through the crocodile's mouth. now, i'm crossing the water with the rocks
aha! saw the elephant, and i'm at the giraffe. went down, passed the snake and, oh hey, there's the treasure box! *finished*. we made it, pal! is there a next map or we're done?

chat.msg: hola, q tal? ready to start?
si
great! start by heading left from the white dog, go below the bench and cross the trail towards the florist stand
but don't reach it, ok?
ok and now?
let's shake things up
make a sharp 180 degree left u-turn, cross back over the trail and head towards the white dog again. can you see it?
I guess? I'm near the fishes in front of the dog
perfect! now, keep going south past the dog
just keep moving until you spot another dog beside a red and white checkered picnic
across the river?
yes, exactly! cross the branch and keep heading south
have you reached the picnic yet?
yes i'm at the picnic now
awesome, just continue across the picnic mat and touch the bowl of berries
ok i'm on the bowl of berries
great stuff! now keep heading west from there
until when
looks like you're gonna have to cross that river one more time
there's a branch across it, can you cross it to the north?
until where? i don't understand, i'm near the bicycle
cool, don't touch that green bush, but go around it from the right side, until you spot that florist stand again
i'm at the florist stand now
groovy! take a left, go underneath the stand and head towards the big bridge with those two biking champs on it
i'm at the biking champs now
so fly past them and head west until you see two elderly people catching up on some news
see 'em?
yes i'm on the elderly people now
sweet! now move a few steps down south, between those cool old people and a wooden branch until you reach a green bush
i'm at the green bush to the left of the deer
great! now go east for a bit, staying between the branch and the bush
i don't understand
no worries! just keep moving to the east, with the branch on one side and the bush on the other

chat.msg: hey there, estas listo?
yes
great! i'm at the tent up north
where do i go next?
Go down to the left of the dog, scoop under hum and over the fire until you're under the mushrooms
alright, now i'm under the red mushroom near the fire
what's next, pal?
now loop back around and then go down on the trail that's in front of the blue car
okay, looks like i'm now in front of the blue car on a trail
where to next, buddy?
go down that trail and go around the telescope a little bit and then go down to the right leg of the telescope
got it, i'm now at the right leg of the blue telescope, what's the next move?

now make a sharp left under the telescope, there a trail under the telescope so follow along the trail until you see the gray rocks above that trail swerve a little bit upward. Then cross up the rocks, NW and you'll see a brown house
followed your directions, and hey, there's the wooden house! good job guiding me, pal
*finished*

chat.msg: hi there! que comience el juego!!
where to?
alright, first move under the palm tree in front of you, then make a quick right and then immediately left, heading south
let's get going!
not sure i understand but i'm above the dog now
that works! now keep moving south but make a slight left, get past the puppy and then head right
let's shake a leg!
ok... i'm to the right of the puppy, now what.
sweet! you should see a big rock to your left and a small rock to your right
just squeeze through both and keep moving toward the water. you're doing great!
ok i'm at the crab now, what's next
excellent! now turn right and head along the big rock
keep going west. in the water, no dry feet today!
i don't understand, tell me what you want to be to head toward, describe the item
sorry for causing confusion! keep going west till you spot a medium-sized rock in the water
head towards that
there are many rocks in the water
whoops! my bad. look for the third rock, the medium one, then you'll see a shark
you'll have to make a sharp right turn. stay in the water
i'm at the rock to the right of the shark
that's the spot! now, head back to the land, move between the rock and a tri-colored ball
get going north. you're a natural at this!
ok i'm between a rock and the ball now
nice one! next, veer slightly to the left, go northwest. you'll see a red tent and a speaker
just cruise right between them. you've got this!
i'm at the red tent
great job! walk around the tent
once you've done that, let's head south, but stop just before you hit the water again
ok i looped around the red tent and went all the way down to the water
perfecto! at the water, turn right and walk until you are below a red kayak
the kayak is to the left...
oh sorry about that, go right under that kayak then turn right again going north
until?
keep going until you reach a small green bush
that's your final spot. great job!
the bush above the red kayak?
that's the one! congrats, you reached the final spot
well navigated!

general_survey.answer: Just to be clear, my first language was Spanish and then I learned English right alongside it
